name: EVOLUTION METALS CORP.
description: Research, development and sales of rare earth metals (critical minerals)
sampleDescriptions: US Congressional and Governmental support for obtaining critical minerals and rare earth metals from domestic sites and from sites in allied countries for use in critical communications, defense, tech
Client seeks to develop, explore, mine and refine critical minerals and rare earth metals in the Western Hemisphere to alleviate the dependence on China for these critical resources.
